title: Flagellant
name: Damien
summary: A zealous devotee who finds power and religious ecstasy through self-inflicted pain. Once a vagrant, Damien discovered his calling after a violent encounter, leading him to dedicate his life to suffering as a form of worship and atonement.
history: Formerly a destitute wanderer in the city, Damien's life changed when he was attacked by drunks. The pain awakened a fervent religious conviction within him, leading him to join the clergy and later seek out suffering as a form of spiritual enlightenment.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Believes his pain can absolve others of their sins
